dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: The way of... Wine? Drinking etiquette? Forsooth, I am quite unacquainted with that subject. Kaugh, 't-tis quite bitter!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg:
Good morrow to thee! Though the weather may be quite dreary, hm~ This crisp smell of daybreak is quite pleasant, is it not?
'Tis the perfect time for a reconnaissance, indeed!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Ah, oft do I forgo a midday meal in favor of honing my skills with a blade.
Forget that, for I must now narrate the events of my reconnaissance!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Mm... I have heard tale of a culture that oft sups alongside an alcoholic beverage, indeed. Yet it ill-fits my temperament... I merely wish to gorge myself on slabs of meaty yukjeon(meat fritter)!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
I wish only to twirl and let my blade sing with abandon! Seldom did I expect me to be forced to learn 'the way of wine'... 
... P-prithee, do not let Lady Outis hear of my complaints!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Sip from a bottle, sip from a cup... what difference does it make? It ends up in my gullet all the same. I am befuddled at why any would focus on a subject so irrelevant from the blade.
Fie, I care not for such trifles. Thou must hear of the mischief the Kurokumo Clan is up to.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Tis my belief that to cut something along the arc of my blade is much more satisfying than indulging in a succulent meal!
The sensation of that slight resistance as the blade cuts through the mass... 'tis quite exhilarating, wouldst thou not agree?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
I sensed that we may find ourselves a few unwelcome guests! I deduced it from the untimely stirring, indeed.
'Tis only right that no traveler graces the roads at this time. So I have righted all the wrongs.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
To slice through the air as I train myself in the way of blades, and to hew the deserving ones as I walk the path... there is very little difference.
If I were to make a distinction... mm, I must say, the only difference is the weight in my hands.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: 'Tis a moonlight most fair... Hath the battle left nicks in my blade...? Whew, not even a speck of dust remains on its edge.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Ah, 'twas naught but the noise outside. Wouldst thou mind if I should go on a little stroll to investigate?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Hm? Ah, give me but a moment—I must first swallow this...

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I shall scurry there posthaste!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I am quite busy at the moment!

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: How thrilling!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hm? Aha, I must not have struck true...

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Uagh!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Ah, truly! 'Twas a flesh-splitting sensation!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Aah, haah... Forsooth, well did I expect to be... hewn... myself.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Heigh-ho! I have done it~!

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Uh-ahm~ I-I suppose I have made a mistake...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: 'Twas naught but a quick jaunt indeed. Now I return with a lighter heart to... where Lady Outis awaits. Drat...

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I have swung my blade with abandon! Ah, how refreshing, how exhilarating! Now, I may have enough patience to sit through such interminable lectures!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: A flaw in my techniques... I must have grown complacent. I shall persevere...
